Class MiniPlayerController

java.lang.Object
musicApp.controllers.ViewController<MiniPlayerView>
musicApp.controllers.MiniPlayerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.scene.media.AudioSpectrumListener, MiniPlayerView.MiniPlayerViewListener
public class MiniPlayerController extends ViewController<MiniPlayerView> implements javafx.scene.media.AudioSpectrumListener, MiniPlayerView.MiniPlayerViewListener
Controller managing the MiniPlayerView and processing audio spectrum data received on `spectrumDataUpdate`

  • Method Details

    • toggleView

      public void toggleView(boolean show)
      Toggle the visibility of the mini player window.

    • getBandsNumber

      public int getBandsNumber()
      Returns the number of audio spectrum bands used for visualization.
      Specified by:
      getBandsNumber in interface MiniPlayerView.MiniPlayerViewListener
      Returns:
      the number of bands

    • loadSong

      public void loadSong(Song song)
      Loads the given song into the view by updating its title and cover image.
      Parameters:
      song - the song to load

    • spectrumDataUpdate

      public void spectrumDataUpdate(double timestamp, double duration, float[] magnitudes, float[] phases)
      Callback method that receives real-time audio spectrum data from the JavaFX media player. This method processes the magnitude values to a visually normalized and corrected form and then updates the view for visualization.
      Specified by:
      spectrumDataUpdate in interface javafx.scene.media.AudioSpectrumListener
      Parameters:
      timestamp - the timestamp of the audio data
      duration - the duration of the audio data
      magnitudes - the array of magnitude values
      phases - the array of phase values (not used in this implementation)

    • applyCorrection

      private float applyCorrection(float normalizedValue, int index)
      Applies a visual correction to a normalized magnitude value. This correction enhances the representation by scaling and centering the output visually.
      Parameters:
      normalizedValue - the normalized magnitude (0.0 to 1.0)
      index - the index of the frequency band
      Returns:
      the corrected value for visual representation
